section.title: Available Documentation
section.para: The following &PRODNAME; documentation is available as of v0.9:

listitem.para: Introduction: The introduction provides an architectural overview, a glossary of key concepts, and a step-by-step walkthrough of one sample deployment.

Deployment Handbooks: Deployment handbooks are non-procedural collections of key facts designed to be helpful in preparing to use specific &PRODNAME; components. Deployment handbooks are available for:
Authentication
Rate Limiting
Root.WAR
Versioning
